title: WTB Lew Lipset's Encyclopedia of Baseball Cards Volume 3
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB Lew Lipset's Encyclopedia of Baseball Cards Volume 3
posts.post_content:
Does anyone have an old copy of the volume 3 tobacco book? Id like to buy one..

please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

If for some reason the Ebay one doesn't work for you, just go to amazon.com and search "Lew Lipset." You will get a variety of used copies available for sale in various configurations of Vol. I, II and III.
